name: Parasitic Love
description:
Every second, you hear the parasite approaching... Don't be afraid, and let your light guide you trough the darkness!

Even when out of your sight, the parasite gets closer. You are only a little firefly, unable to kill your hunter, so in a last ditch attempt to safe yourself, you try to collect every note to find out what's going on. Can you collect all 20 of them?

PLEASE play in fullscreen mode for the optimal experience! This horror game was made in 8 hours for the Berlin Mini Game Jam on March 26th, 2022.

Controls
  • W A S D  to move
  • Left Mouse Button for menu
Credits
  • Sir.Daniel - Programming and Level Design
  • LopDa093 - Programming
  • steven-vd - Programming
  • Tamatsu - Art and Audio
